scripts.generate: pnpm run generate:api-reference && pnpm run generate:mint
scripts.generate:api-reference: rm -rf api-reference && mkdir -p api-reference && mintlify-scrape openapi-file -o api-reference https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amp-labs/openapi/main/api/generated/api.json | tail -n +2 > ./api-reference/index.json
scripts.generate:api-reference:local: rm -rf api-reference && mkdir -p api-reference && mintlify-scrape openapi-file -o api-reference ./api.json | tail -n +2 > ./api-reference/index.json
